long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Client Magician allows you to add friends on Facebook who have the same interests as you!

It's also a very simple extension to use.

Simple instructions:

1. Navigate to Facebook Group
2. Click on "Members"
3. Input as many keywords as you like separated by commas
4. Decide how many friend requests you want to send
5. Hit "Run" and Client Magician will automatically add friends who fit your interests!
